name: Sleep Walking (Xmegamanx399)
description:
This is a game made for the CGX Grad Jam 2021. This game is about completing tasks in order to go back to bed. you can only see near you as the house is dark at night. Complete your tasks and GO TO BED!!!!!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS:

WASD - move

Left Shift (hold)- Sprint

Mouse - look

left mouse button - Interact

R - reset

Esc - Exit game
